Invia Group Germany| As (Senior) Frontend Developer (m/f)| Berlin, Germany | ONSITE | RELOCATION supported

Do you want to work for one of the most successful German e-commerce companies and develop the future of online travel industry? You like to move something big and being included in decisions? Well-engineered and robust code are a point of honour for you, because you're interested in the architecture of your utilized technologies? Well, we got you covered! As (Senior) Frontend Developer (m/f), you're a key player and responsible for engineering and implementing software products in a robust and well maintainable manner. The product owner is consulting you and you're responsible to create and work on big projects, cutting-edge products, refactorings and migrations.

Some of your tasks would be:

• Drafting solutions with the product owner and implementing them • Migration of legacy code to a new software, especially from jQuery into MVW • Realizing drafts following standards and best practices for structured and modular HTML, SASS/CSS and JavaScript for different systems and browsers => unfortunatetley this also includes the "Internet Explorer" • Defining criteria for usability and accessibility • You contribute and share ideas and knowledge • Working in multidisciplinary and agile teams of great people

You can find more information about us on invia.de/en/

In case you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact Alexander Schubert via jobs@invia.de

Apply directly here: http://bit.ly/SFED-Invia
